title: Live Billiards Deluxe v1.5 Cracked [3D Virtual Pool]
description:
Live Billiards Deluxe v.1.5 Cracked
===================================

Publisher: TerraGame 
Website: http://www.terragame.com/lbdbuy.shtml


Live Billiards is a comprehensive 3D pool simulator, giving you
full reality sensation. Magnetic live atmosphere, smooth cue shots
and realistic ball movements create effect of deep immersion. It&#039;s
full 3D environment, light effects on ivory and bronze, twinkling
fireplace, perfect 3D sound and live voice chat maintain the
realism of championship style pool. 
Live Billiards features fast and fun game play, supports Straight 
Pool, 14+1, 3, 8, 9, exotic Pyramid, American and Rotation games. 
Game supports complex non-center strikes, English, masse, sly ball 
rotations, ball jumping and take-offs outside table.

DeLuxe version contains additional Space room, table and new 
Rotation pool game type.


Minimal requirements
--------------------
P400, 64M, 3D accelerated video, 8M RAM,
DirectX6.1 or higher.
